department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: CSB Kitchen and Washroom Renovation at Wabush Airport
description: Invitation to Tender: Invitation to provide financial bid for renovation project
full_summary:
## Invitation to Qualify for Kitchen and Washroom Renovation Contract

**Tender Title:** ITT-EC373-241522 - CSB Kitchen and Washroom Renovation – Wabush Airport, NL

**Notice Type:** Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) 

**Procurement Reference Number:** WS4396900530-Doc4437463574

**Closing Date:** March 12, 2024, at 2:00 PM AST (Atlantic Standard Time)

**Invitation Overview**
------------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified suppliers to participate in the CSB Kitchen and Washroom Renovation project at the Wabush Airport in Newfoundland and Labrador, Canada.

**Description**
---------------

The renovation project involves the upgrade of the kitchen and washroom facilities at the CSB located within the Wabush Airport. This invitation is the second phase of the two-phase process, which requires suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings.

**Bid Requirements**
-------------------

To participate, bidders must meet the selection criteria, which includes:

*  Ability to provide services and deliverables as outlined in the bid documents.
*  Lowest price will be the primary selection criterion.

**Trade Agreements**
--------------------

This bid is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Regions of Opportunity**
-------------------------

Newfoundland and Labrador is the sole region of opportunity for this tender process.

**Procurement Information**
--------------------------

*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contact Information:**
    *   Sonia Stockman (PSPC)
    *   Email: [sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
